2083.subject: HCOM
2083.descrlong: Explores the dynamics of American social and political structures and the relationship to culture. Examines the roots of racism, sexism, and classism with a special emphasis on leadership development and community participation. Offers built-in assessment in HCOM MLO 5 or the concentrations in Comparative American Studies; Chicana/o - Latina/o Studies; Practical and Professional Ethics; Women's Studies; or Pre-Law. Requires successful completion of the ENGCOM ULR. (Offered occasionally.)
